name: SheepCreep
description:
WARNINGS: 

  • The game is P2P only so someone needs to forward port 7777 and find some friends you don't mind sharing your IP with.
  • Watch the headphone volume!

Steps to play:

  1. Everyone downloads the Unity executable.
  2. Launch the game.
  3. One player clicks ‘Host (Server + Client)’ to host.
  4. Other players fill out the hosting IP address in the ‘Client’ text field and click the ‘Client’ button. This will take you to the game lobby.
  5. Players click ‘Ready’ in the lobby.
  6. Host sets game parameters and clicks ‘START GAME’
    1. ‘START GAME’ will only show up when all players have clicked ‘Ready’

How to play (Players):

  1. Players go into the temple.
  2. Try to find the special green eyed critters. Press ‘F’ to make them follow you.
  3. Run away from the dangerous red eyed critters.
  4. If a teammate is downed by the critters, hold left click on them for 3 seconds to heal them
  5. Escort green eyed critters to the safe zones outside the temple. Press ‘F’ in the safe zone to capture them.
  6. You win by collecting all the special critters.

How to play (Monster):

  1. You blend in with regular critters except for your eye color, use this to get close to the players.
  2. Players can hear your grumbling when you are nearby.
  3. Hold shift to sprint. This will make you almost as fast as a player.
  4. Press space bar to attack.
  5. You win by downing all of the players.

Other:

  • ESC to see some basic settings. Be careful with the graphics slider.
